setting.label: Activer l'auto-détection langage de requête de recherche
setting.name: system/autodetect/enable

strings.setting: Si ensemble, la langue de recherche est automatiquement détecté. Notez que cela ne fonctionne pas très bien des termes de recherche de courte durée.
Lorsqu'elle est activée, GeoNetwork s'applique automatiquement les correctifs de certains lorsque vous enregistrez des métadonnées.
Si défini, GeoNetwork permet de trouver des hyperliens cliquables dans les métadonnées.

setting.label: Utiliser les liens de la section distribution - sans changement
setting.name: system/downloadservice/leave

strings.setting: Selecting this option means that GeoNetwork will not handle file downloads.

setting.label: Utiliser le service de téléchargement GeoNetwork (resources.get)
setting.name: system/downloadservice/simple

strings.setting: If metadata protocol is 'Data for download' then this service lets the user download the resource from GeoNetwork with no further user input - it is the simplest download interface

setting.label: Utiliser le service analysant les contraintes d'accès GeoNetwork (file.disclaimer)
setting.name: system/downloadservice/withdisclaimer

strings.setting: If metadata protocol is 'Data for download' then this service lets the user download the resource from GeoNetwork after they have agreed to accept any metadata constraints/generic disclaimer. The resource is bundled into a zip archive with an html description of the metadata constraints and a snapshot of the metadata record (as a MEF).
This is the administrator's email address used to send feedback.
The SMTP host and port parameters are used to send emails to GeoNetwork's users when a resource is downloaded.

setting.label: Metadata / ISO19139 / Nil reason attribute with held
setting.name: hidewithheldelements

setting.label: Cacher les éléments nécessitant autorisation (ie. withheld)
setting.name: system/hidewithheldelements/enable

setting.label: Conserver les éléments (sinon ils sont supprimés)
setting.name: system/hidewithheldelements/keepMarkedElement

strings.setting: The network and netmask parameters are used to identify internal connections to GeoNetwork, that is, to identify the intranet group.
Si défini, GeoNetwork va calculer les cotes de l'utilisateur pour les métadonnées de ce nœud seulement (pas répartis entre les autres nœuds GeoNetwork).

setting.label: Définir les privilèges uniquement pour les groupes de l'utilisateur
setting.name: system/metadataprivs/usergrouponly

strings.setting: The number of OAI resultSets that can be stored in the Cache.

Influences the behaviour of OAI when parameters from or until are supplied. If set to temporal extent, the temporal extent of the date described by the metadata is searched. If set to modification date, the date at which the metadata was last modified is searched
Please note: restart GeoNetwork to make this change active.

setting.label: Délai d'expiration du jeton de reprise (ResumptionToken)
setting.name: system/oai/tokentimeout

strings.setting:
The number of seconds a OAI resultset stays in the cache and can be scrolled using the OAI resumptionToken
Please note: restart GeoNetwork to make this change active.
If set, GeoNetwork will use the provided proxy parameters when accessing remote nodes. For example, this is used during the harvesting.

setting.label: Sauvegarde des métadonnées lors de la suppression
setting.name: removedMetadata

strings.requestedlanguage_offonly: All documents in all languages (No preferences)
strings.requestedlanguageprefer_locale: Prefer documents with translations requested language
strings.requestedlanguageprefer_docLocale: Prefer documents whose language is the requested language
strings.requestedlanguage_docLocaleonly: Document language is the requested language

setting.label: Rechercher uniquement dans la langue de la requête
setting.name: system/requestedLanguage/only

setting.label: Résultats de la recherche dans la langue demandée triés sur le dessus
setting.name: system/requestedLanguage/sorted

strings.setting: If set, Statistics on searches will be collected and stored in the database.

The server's host and port are used to create URLs to the GeoNetwork server. For example, they are used during metadata editing to create resource links and when returning the server's capabilities during a CS/W request.
Please note: you should use the GAST tool to reflect this change inside the metadata.
Used to identify the installation.
Identifiant du catalogue. Après changement de l'identifiant, il est nécessaire de mettre à jour l'index et redéfinir le logo à partir de l'interface d'administration.
strings.reasonForOne: Fonction non testée ou non supportée pour la base de données
strings.reasonForMore: A partir du nombre de processeurs
strings.setting: If set, XLinks to metadata fragments in records will be resolved.

If set, during startup GeoNetwork will start the Z39.50 server component. This component uses the ISO23950 protocol.
Please note: restart GeoNetwork to make this change active.

Change the Z39.50 listening port.
Please note: restart GeoNetwork to make this change active.

strings.otherlogins: Autoriser les connexions d'autres utilisateurs depuis
strings.data.subversionPath: Répertoire du dépôt de gestion des versions :
strings.java.vm.name: JVM nom :
strings.os.name: Système / nom :
